original_definition: 'automatic FRR activation delay' means the period of time between the setting of a new setpoint value by the frequency restoration controller and the start of physical automatic FRR delivery;
generated_definition: 'automatic FRR activation delay' means not exceeding 30 seconds for a frr providing unit or group.

Article 158: a FRR providing unit or FRR providing group for automatic FRR shall have an automatic FRR activation delay not exceeding 30 seconds;
